title: X-O Manowar v2 01-21 + Ex (1996-1998, Acclaim Comics)
description: Due to massive problems with the ordering and release of the Deathmate crossover with Image Comics, Valiant was forced to go under in 1996 and sold to Acclaim Entertainment's fledgling comics division. X-O Manowar was briefly relaunched, but did not last too long as Acclaim itself filed for bankruptcy due to their financial woes as a result of mismanaging their video games department. These 21 issues are notably for the work of Mark Waid, who would make a major name for himself as an independent writer and for his work with Marvel. I have also included the rare Iron Man crossover, Heavy Metal, penned by Fabian Nicieza. Along with my Volume 1 torrent, this is all X-O Manowar material published prior to the recent Valiant relaunch. Thanks to the original scanners and uploaders, whoever you may be lol. Please seed and enjoy! :-)
